contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 8, 1998 D Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (2nd and 3rd Section)
Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival (Second and Third Section) 25 Entertainments Contest Milton Keynes Brass Band Festival milton-keynes-brass-band-festival-23-section
Stantonbury Theatre, Milton Keynes, Buckinghamshire, England, UK Bands played an entertainment programme including Torch Of Freedom. 14 bands competed. Best Instrumentalist: Stephen Letcher, Euphonium, Epping Forest Highest third section: Rushden Windmill
1st Prize: £300.00 (Copperad Challenge Bowl trophy) 2nd Prize: £100.00 (Festival Challenge trophy) 3rd Prize: £60.00 (Midsummer Challenge trophy)
March 7, 2011, 5:18 p.m. Oct. 21, 2011, 9:50 a.m.
1 The Egham Band Gareth Green
2 Rushden Windmill Band Andrew Keirl
3 Epping Forest Band Marc Easener
4 Shipston Town Band Dave Lea
5 Ibstock Brick Brass David Maplestone
6 City of Birmingham Band Warren Belshaw
7 British Airways Martin Hayter
8 Cawston Band James Utting
9 Milton Keynes Brass Colin Stevens
10 Daw Mill Colliery Band Ray White
11 Wantage Silver Band John Chesterman
12 Stourport-on-Severn Brass Band David Bishop-Rowe
Withdrawn Moulton '77 Band Geoff Riseley
Withdrawn Welwyn Garden City Band Eddy Claxton
